actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

actions.subcommittee: Compensation, Pension, Insurance and Memorial Affairs
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Compensation, Pension, Insurance and Memorial Affairs.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Compensation, Pension, Insurance, and Memorial Affairs

official_title: To amend title 38, United States Code, to provide a presumption of service connection for certain specified diseases and disabilities in the case of veterans who were exposed during military service to carbon tetrachloride.

summary.text: Amends Federal law to provide a presumption of service connection for specified diseases and disabilities of veterans who were exposed to carbon tetrachloride while on active military, naval, or air service of 90 days or more.

titles.title: To amend title 38, United States Code, to provide a presumption of service connection for certain specified diseases and disabilities in the case of veterans who were exposed during military service to carbon tetrachloride.
